comment.author: 9737230@N07
comment._content: This is one of the most beautiful Lakes I have seen,My family would camp down at the lake.  The Wallowa Lake Lodge is a classic!

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
Thanks for sharing! 

The images Ralph Gifford took traveling through this state are really gems. Not only is it wonderful to see the "Oregon of the past," he was a brilliant photographer who took brilliant pictures...
